title: Midtown Scavenger Hunt
description: Explore the hidden gems of Soho with this exciting scavenger hunt!

tasks.title: Stop 1
tasks.hint: Your destination is an art installation hidden between the offices of two banking giants. Hint: let our first president lead the way!

tasks.title: Stop 2
tasks.hint: Your next destination is a coffee turned vinyl store. Hint: What rhymes with latte?

tasks.title: Stop 3
tasks.hint: Spend the evening at your last destination: a historic bar in westside Soho. Hint: Why did the chicken cross the road? Cluck!
